actions.text: Committee on Intelligence ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Intelligence reported an original measure. Without written report.
Referred to Senate Committee on Budget.
Senate Committee on Budget discharged by Consent Vote.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 150.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A original resolution waiving section 402(A) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to consideration of Title IV of S.1127, which authorized supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1981 for intelligence activities of the United States.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 1127 (intelligence activities funding).

titles.title: A original resolution waiving section 402(A) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to consideration of Title IV of S.1127, which authorized supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1981 for intelligence activities of the United States.
